website_summaries.verdict: The Gear VR is the best virtual-reality gadget you can buy right now, and a great way to jump into the world of VR gaming and entertainment -- just make sure you own a compatible Samsung phone first.
pros: The Gear VR's relatively low price belies a compelling VR experience, and the games are quickly catching up to the hype
The headset is fairly light, and offers a completely cordless experience
cons: It only works with some recent Samsung phones
The mobile VR experience still pales in comparison to more robust upcoming PC- and console-based options

customer_reviews.title: The price is tempting but the quality is similarly ripe. Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset but I do believe it has reached it end. For someone that wants to check out VR this is an excellent and inexpensive choice. I was only disappointed that my Galaxy S7 would over heat causing the system to require rest. Perhaps it was just my phone but this model is actually quite old in the technology scenes. I recommend buying it to the those that are just a little curious. As for the avid VR people I think this is a little a low level (NOW not when new) set.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hanson

customer_reviews.title: I really love this. I've been using it a lot lately ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I've been using it a lot lately for entertainment or games. I do have maybe two complaints however, the padding around the mask is a bit lacking. I feel like you should consider buying new padding that is better fit for this. Second, the touchpad is a bit annoying. Having your hand in this air constantly gets tiring and sometimes isn't too responsive. The price I paid is fair I believe, which was around 60$, though the latest Samsung Gear VR might be worth your time and money just a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Alec B.

customer_reviews.title: Getting there!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great second generation product, but there was one compromise at least that limits its usefulness to me. I require corrective lenses, which don't fit well under the headset. Because the focus mechanism is singular, I can't get lenses to focus properly for both eyes at the same time, so I get a picture that's half right. That makes using the headset for more than a brief time fatiguing. The ability to adjust each lens independently would make it perfect. Content is still light I think and the physical controls are inadequate, but these are things that we can accept at this relatively early stage.
customer_reviews.author: Immolate

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. The 360 cameras need to catch up, but this is still eons ahead of the cardboard or anything else simply because of access to apps and a bunch of other features. Works well, and if you sit in front of a fan it really never overheats for me. Like I said, the 360 cameras google streetviewer (one of my favorite apps) and the like use need to catch up to make this truly spectacular. My father normally wears glasses, but he just adjusts his viewing and does not need to wear them on the VR. Computer generated content is much clearer than the ones from the 360 cameras, like I said. All in all amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: WSMD

customer_reviews.title: Great experience for as long as it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are great, like being there. One star removed as it is blurry to me, perhaps it is my eyes, as there is a way to focus. Battery life on phone is very short, cannot view for very long. After a fairly short time I get a message my phone (Samsung S7) is hot and I need to remove it. It is hot, needs to cool off. This not the Note7 that is recalled, it is the S7 that works great as a phone, never gets hot otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: John Dappert

customer_reviews.title: The best for Samsung phones
customer_reviews.text: This headset is hands-down the best for older Samsung Galaxy units. Tried some universal virtual reality goggles. This one is above and beyond the others, the best for our S7 and s6 model!!
customer_reviews.author: R.Edward

customer_reviews.title: Had for return decided to keep..
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my drone sy first I couldn't work it it's not the manufacturer's fault That was all me. LOL Once I finally got it going. Picture quality is all right, not the greatest. But It got me where I wanted to be. Unfortunately still was kind of blurry. But good enough to see where I was going. Overall I give this product a 3 + 1/2 Maybe four stars. I had four return until I found out how to use it. Decided to keep them. Thank you for the product still in use..
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get your feet wet.
customer_reviews.text: Really big fan of the gear VR. I think the content has gotten a lot better since I purchased it, and the experience is pretty emersive for the price. I have an edge seven that works great. The 3d movies look great, and can't wait until Avatar and Gravity become available. Cons. The app is a battery suck if you are watching a movie. The headphone jack is really close to the port so small headphones or blue tooth are recommended. The swipe pad is good for menu swiping and thats it, if you plan on gaming get the controller. Overall thoughts, great purchase for people looking into VR without spending multiple hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was an early adapter, but I didn't expect it to be this bad.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with an S7 or edge understands. Your phone gets hot and drains your battery in no time. The experience was cool, until my S7 edge rebooted and felt hot to the touch. Also in case anyone is unaware, the resolution is pretty bad. It's like trying to watch a screen with a punch of pixels everywhere. Early on, there was almost no content and whatever was non-samsung, really was short, sad, and poorly implemented. Smudges are hard to clean and it really should have come with a joystick
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Heimur

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly cheap way to get into VR
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money if you have a compatible phone. The VR presence is night/day compared to the typical "phone holder" you get with something like Google's Cardboard or any of the chinese plastic knock-offs. The available content is definitely lacking and most games are a bit pricey for what you get. Most of them run about $5 per hour of play (that is, a $10 game takes 2 hours to beat). I also have the HTC Vive and can say that it's close to the same experience. Obviously the Vive is 3x the product, but also at 8x the cost.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Fairly cheap and decent VR experience, but there are better options out there
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy, bulky. Only works with a few Samsung phones. Biggest gripe is that the controls are up on the headset itself (no remote control) which means that you have to keep holding your arm up. This is fine for ten minutes of just playing around, but gets extremely tedious and eventually painful after an hour or more. The Google Daydream View is much better, and even though it at the time (December 2016) is only compatible with the Google Pixel and Pixel XL more phones, from a number of manufacturers, are on the way. Unlike the Samsung Gear VR will only ever be compatible with a small number of Samsung phones.
customer_reviews.author: Matt N.

customer_reviews.title: The Headset is great as a standalone product
customer_reviews.text: The Headset is great as a standalone product, however when coupled with your Samsung phone (Look Out) it heats up very quickly in just about the time you start enjoying your VR experience. I mean how can you be expected to watch a movie as an example if you have to stop and let your phone cool down every 30 minutes or so? Where's the fun in that?? Maybe I missed something along the way, but if you search this headset model on Youtube, you'll see that users are attaching makeshift external fans to the face plate in order to cool down their phone - Really ???? Hardly worth the effort if you ask me!
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for 12 dollars
customer_reviews.text: There isnt much available that works well on older phones, but if you want to try it out, this is way better then any cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: A. Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Even after watching multiple YouTube videos on this product, I was still skeptical. On first try, I fell in love with the product. Between Oculus, Samsung, and Google cardboard, there are various places where you can download apps and games . I did notice overheating problems initially however this was an easy fix with some ice packets (3x5 Gel Pack Reusable Hot or Cold Ice Packs for Overheating, Pain Relief, or First Aid By IceWraps (6 Pack, Blue), turning on blocking mode, and altering the brightness on the VR headset. Highly recommend a slow transition to this headset if you are prone to motion sickness. Other than that, enjoy the roller coasters, haunted houses, and exploring space.
customer_reviews.author: Oz W

customer_reviews.title: Good entry into the vr gimmick
customer_reviews.text: If it didn't let in so much light, it'd be 4 stars. The white plastic prevents full immersion. The other docked star is because of its lack of playtime value. I'm not sure if I know anyone who uses this for more than just an occasional foray into vr world. All of the apps cost money, there's no possibility for a refund if you don't like something, and the software is meh.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: Terrific device, good quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: I use this Gear VR headset with a Samsung Galaxy S6 and it is terrific. Very simple to use and great for playing games or watching 3D VR movies. The quality of materials is very high and it is comfortable to wear. It's also a very inexpensive way to do VR which will save you hundreds of dollars compared to a regular Oculus headset. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Apple

customer_reviews.title: I really did enjoy this device
customer_reviews.text: I really did enjoy this device. The downside, the thing that really kills this entire product is that a lot of phone companies have gone to a lease only option. So I got to play with this device for 16 months before having to return my phone for my upgrade. The new Galaxy S8+ is not compatible with this version. That is really nonsense to me. Samsung should really allow us to swap out the older Gear for the newer one. I will not buy another one, now for a higher price tag, only to have it obsolete in 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap way to try VR.  Better than Google Cardboard / 3rd party copies.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice and cheap way to try VR (Way better than Google Cardboard. Has internal hardware for optimized low latency head tracking. Reduces viewing lag when pivoting your head.) Very well made. Easy to use. Comfortable. Cons: Face cushion can get gross pretty quickly. (Oily face, heavy sweater, etc.) Your eyes and face will get hot after prolonged use. Some light leakage near the nose. PD is not adjustable. No protective case. (For $100, Samsung could have given us a protective bag or something.)
customer_reviews.author: RKO

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Samsung owners.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Samsung compatible model phone, you better own the gear vr. Picked this up since it was a cheap way into the VR world and love every bit of it. The list of apps and games is already impressive for being a new to market item. My biggest complaint is after using the unit sometimes the recent apps and home button stop responding, simple reset of the phone fixes the issue but still a little annoying. Also if you get this unit be sure to look into the package disabler app in the play store, it allows you to run all the google cardboard apps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had hours and hours of fun with the Samsung Gear VR. It was very easy to set up and get going. Everything inside of the Oculus software is pretty self explanatory. As far as cons go: there aren't a lot of free apps currently. There also isn't any search system inside of the Oculus app store. It makes finding apps extremely difficult. For example, Netflix was somewhere on the 18th page of the app store. A search feature would go a long way. For this reason, I deducted a star. However, this is an overall great device at a nice price point compared to other VR headsets out there right now.
customer_reviews.author: H Adams

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome Christmas  gift!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this for Christmas and I've barely been able to use it because my wife and son keep taking it. It's fun to go under virtual water and see sharks, dolphins, sea turtles, and other creatures. I also like playing temple run and looking behind me and seeing the gorilla chasing me. The visuals aren't perfect but once you get into it, you begin not to notice. I'm getting the moga power gamepad to go with it. I'm using the note 5 and I do not seem to have the overheating issues others are having. For $99 it's a no brainer. Our Christmas was so much fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Crispeto

customer_reviews.title: Lots of potential,.... but not quite there yet
customer_reviews.text: Dont get me wrong. It is the future. On the downside it can be punishing wearing this for a extended pedriod of time. It fits more as bragging in with friends to show the vr capabilities. 15 percent of the content is watchable. 35 so so. 50 percent trash. Still lot of potential there (in vr I mean, not samsung vr). It makes me mad Samsung is locked to oculus home screen and you need workarounds to test anything outside oculus.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Perez

customer_reviews.title: ... several VR headsets and by far this is the best one out there on the market now
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several VR headsets and by far this is the best one out there on the market now. One of the best features of this headset is the face that everything is done with the headset on.. there is NO need to remove the headset and use the cell phone to direct you anywhere. It is comfortable to wear and you do not need to buy an external remote. Everything is built right into the VR Headset. There are tons of apps available for the Samsung VR out now. Best one on the market now..
customer_reviews.author: avi8trgal

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, purchased it as a gift for granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. I should have purchased one for her parents {my son and his wife} LOL. All three of them enjoy it very much. I asked my son does she get to use it? and then I asked her and she said yes . LOL It is truly an experience I tried the roller coaster and something else my granddaughter had me to look at and I literally got dizzy even while I was sitting down.
customer_reviews.author: Very Happy

customer_reviews.title: Return?
customer_reviews.text: Samsung produces great products. I Like the material quality, it is good. However, it arrived late and was given no indicator, prior to purchase that it is incompatible with my Galaxy Sj7 skypro. I was given a small credit towards purchases at Amazon because of the tardiness.
customer_reviews.author: Jed- Henry Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: get a swivel chair and be prepared to have your mind blown
customer_reviews.text: Mind blowing experience. My son bought one first, After I used his I had to have my own. You have to have the Samsung phone for it to work. but if you have the phone this is a MUST! It comes assembled all you put on is the strap for your head. You take off the cover and plug your phone in. Somehow it loads information on you phone that makes it work. It loads a lot of extremely cool experiences, but you can easily add more. You will need a swivel chair to get the full effect. You are totally immersed in a 360 virtual reality.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Blurriness and constant need to adjust killed it for me.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed I had to keep rubbing my eyes because unless you had it in the perfect position, it all looked blurry. Watching netflix on here wasn't too good. If you look at the center of the virtual theater, the other sides are blury, so you'd have to move your head to make our what is happening around in whatever you're watching. The browser for Samsung was terrible for me. It kept crashing, freezing, wouldn't load. It was just awful. I just had to return this product because it needs a whole lot of polishing.
customer_reviews.author: Baltazar Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Quite immersive.  But...
customer_reviews.text: I used this with a Samsung S6 Edge with Display set for AMOLED Cinema mode. I like it as a new platform but experience the following problems. 1- My phone overheats pretty quickly. 2- Experience is immersive, but resolution (being very close to eyes) is not smooth. 3- Drift (under special promo now) starts, does not stay up to even complete a level before the phone hangs (dark screen) or it goes hot. I wish: 1- I could try this with other phones, not just the S6 or Note. 2- I could try this device with a cheaper alternative like maybe an old S5 on wifi.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Me

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy but not too bad. Really wish it had a remote since using touch controls on the side of your face feels weird. But can't really complain since it was so cheap. I say if you have a little extra money, get something else with a remote, but if money is really tight, you'll get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Helin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Some of the free apps tend to be blurry, but there are games and other apps that can be downloaded for a small price. Those graphics have been amazing so far! The only advice I can really give is to purchase anti-fog wipes with these as they tend to fog up and that can get annoying.
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Samsung, the Gear VR is a life booster!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift idea ever! If you have doubts about getting one, don't- it's more amazing than you can imagine! I share the one I got for my boyfriend and this Gear VR is the reason I got a Note 5 phone when it came time for me to switch! And every friend I've let put it on to see it for a minute have bought one for themselves! I will go further and state that this "toy" even helps with depression and boredom definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Ra2377ven

customer_reviews.title: One Major Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Impressive technology with a pretty major flaw: it overheats after minimal use. I have managed to extend my usage time significantly by lowering the brightness all the way down and turning off all unnecessary background apps, but eventually I will get the message that my Gear VR needs to cool down before continuing operation. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Eden Torres

customer_reviews.title: and with that the Gear VR will be the best VR experience for the price
customer_reviews.text: Positional tracking for controllers is on the way, and with that the Gear VR will be the best VR experience for the price. I am absolutely astounded at the experience rendered from just 99 bucks. Whether I'm enjoying a 360 AND 3D experience or watching someone else get their mind blown it's always MORE than worth it. Get a bluetooth controller, good headphones, and you're SET! This is a fantastic device, the motion latency is very low, every micro-movement your head makes the Gear VR emulates virtually, keeping you feeling like you're actually looking around.
customer_reviews.author: Darline

customer_reviews.title: Brand New in the Box
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a Galaxy S7 Tracfone and wondered if it would be compatible with the Samsung Gear VR. I found this discontinued model on Amazon. I was surprised that it was brand new in the box and works great. Very happy with the purchase and price. This particular item was just what I was looking for. The newer VR Gear is designed for the newer Galaxy phones. Plenty of free games, apps and 360 videos available. Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: CURTIS BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Virtually Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the neatest piece of tech I own. For $100 this headset is perfect at gatherings to blow people away with the newest gadget available for cell phones. It's image quality is not pristine, as it magnifies your phone screen, but the effect of VR is not diminished. If you're looking for high definition you'd most likely want to go with the Occulus Rift. At 1/4 the cost and mobile, the Gear VR outweighs the clarity of the Rift in my opinion. Great buy, and bonus store keeps adding new apps all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Invigilium

customer_reviews.title: Good starter VR headset
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter. It works great with the phones indicated. She has a Samsung Galaxy Note 5. It is easy to use and there are apps for it. It does seem a tad flimsy with the plastic housing. I used it to see how it worked, and it was VR, felt VR and I had to watch I didn't fall over dodging those asteroids :) It's a nice entry into VR to see if you like it before you spend more on a more sophisticated unit.
customer_reviews.author: TDMac

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to be amazed!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!! would recommend individual focus for each eye (I had to wear my glasses, and it overheats quickly. There are things you can do, such as sitting in front of a small fan, shutting down all unneeded apps, no bluetooth, etc... that can help but I can get about 45 minutes or so before overheating the phone/Gear VR again. For me? Worth every dime!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: WAY COOL, Best $100 you could spend on your phone and entertainment
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! I love it and already addicted on day one. I’m having a hard time keeping my 6 edge cool but that may work its self out. Games are fantastic a little pricy but worth it. Compared to normal app games they range from $4 to $10 or so, movies are way to much. I hope they implement Netflix some day or i just haven’t found it yet. Again only three hours or so old. Found Netflix !!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin V.

customer_reviews.title: Fun at first
customer_reviews.text: I liked it of course, the first month it was really fun to play with and share with people who have never seen anything like it. But after the initial fun is had, it's just kind of boring, nothing too exciting. I think as new games and apps come out, though, It will be fun again. But for now, it's been in my drawer for about a year. It does work well, though and I have had no problems with it!
customer_reviews.author: A girl has no name

customer_reviews.title: like me, you would just have to place it ...
customer_reviews.text: People say that iPhone doesn’t support it, but they’re wrong is some way. You could use an iPhone as long as if it’s not a +. But you won’t actually use the controls as for the area to plug the phone in doesn’t support iPhone. If you use an iPhone, like me, you would just have to place it in there without using the controls. Overall, it’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy It! After only a few minutes it over heats and shuts down. Can't even use it. 5 or 10 minutes tops. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: a masterpiece of machinery
customer_reviews.text: The picture need some more hd and a sharper video But I love the product it new but it leaves room improvements. It will blow your and send you in a new world .check the 3d and 360 of the avengers its a amazing video and you can surf the net and watch full movies .endless possibilities for this product .I had it for two days and I like wow .do yourself a favour and get a note 5 or a s6 and enjoy this product its worth it
customer_reviews.author: Sir Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: it's affordable and amazing. I tried the Oculus Rift at Best Buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 5 stars not because if you already own the phone, it's affordable and amazing. I tried the Oculus Rift at Best Buy and this looks similar to that. The disadvantage of the Gear VR is that it does not track your head. The advantage is the price (if you own the phone). Maybe in 5 years they will look a lot better. It's not as clear as a cheap monitor but being VR seems to make up for that.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and something you have to try for yourself to understand. VR is incredible and this device is the best way to slip into VR without spending a ton on other devices. The only problem I had; was that the USB connector on the device broke. It may have been my fault for removing it too harshly to answer a phone call. Just be careful when you remove your phone from the device. I used the GS6 edge + and loved every second of it!
customer_reviews.author: AndyRay

customer_reviews.title: Get It.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I first thought that it couldn't be that good, but I was completely wrong. The visuals are fast, crisp, clear. Put on headphones and your a million miles away from your living room. When I first received the product, I had an issue with my Note 5 over heating in 10 minutes, but after I put on the Do Not Disturb, Airplane Mode, Turn my Wi-Fi on and power saving mode on, I can play it for two hours straight before I have to take it off, and not because it overheated. If your on the fence about it, buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor. Stop reading. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this device. The screen door effect is really not that bad only if you are being picky. The pixelation on some videos can be a little annoying. I would however recommend regular headphones and not Bluetooth ones the connectivity with some games can sound a little choppy. Wish in would have known that before in order the Samsung U headphones. Game play is like no other it really draws you in and you will have some much fun. Watching someone else playing this is just as entertaining too!
customer_reviews.author: Daiwan Smith

customer_reviews.title: So much needed just to use them
customer_reviews.text: After taking them out of the box and installing about 2 gigs of software needed to run them, the goggles were OK. The phone heated up fast and you could smell it. There is no venting for heat and getting the phone in and out of the goggles took forever. You cannot have a case on your phone either. The strap is also cumbersome and awkward.
customer_reviews.author: J.AX

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected. The touchpad is a little overly sensitive to the tap motion, registering a swipe as a tap just often enough to be occasionally irritating, and I wish the padding was just a little thicker. All the small things add up to just one star off though, totally worth it. My only major problem is my phone overheats in about twenty minutes (S6 Edge), but I feel like thats my phone more than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Oatmeal

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and to use
customer_reviews.text: I got my Gear VR yesterday. Very easy to set up and to use. It is the best VR set I have ever used. I watched a movie with it last night and the only downside is that it is really hard to keep it on you head for a long period of time. It hurts my nose. The other two things that I wish they could improve on it with would making it easier to wear for people with glasses and to change to focal for the lenses so you can focus each lens individually.
customer_reviews.author: Nasser Jahan

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did the headset works well and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had really wanted to purchase a VR headset for a while but couldn't justify the cost l. I found this for a reasonable price and bit. I'm glad I did the headset works well and is comfortable. My family had had a lot of fun watching videos with this headset.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product with a lot of free content on your ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product with a lot of free content on your phone. You can't never really get a good focus with the lenses as it always seems out of focus and the phone gets extremely hot almost immediately, regardless if you're using the cover or not. That's more on the phones fault than the VR's. If you have a phone that works with this, its a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Dima1518

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This has good visual effects. And it gives you a lot of options to choose from after you download the program. Very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, but my stomach doesn't like it one bit!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, just got these and I have to say they are amazing. Clearly the VR stuff is still in it's infancy but when it gets up to speed, it's gonna be nuts. Now the bad news. I'm so nauseous from using this! I downloaded a roller coaster VR app and I can't keep it on my face for more than 40 seconds before I want to barf. And I LOVE roller coasters. I also tried watching a movie. Same effect. Really nauseous. So it's a cool novelty thing to have, but pretty unusable at the current time. Not sure if this is a common reaction to these though. Perhaps it's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Running on Samsung S6 Edge Plus
customer_reviews.text: Running on Samsung S6 Edge Plus This magnifies your cell phone screen the problem is that cell phone screen technology is not there yet so you see pixels wearing the headset. Maybe when the new 4k cell phone screens come out in January of 2017 it will be a lot better and be in real HD but other than that this is where the technology is going and it is very realistic. I saw one where you where in the passenger seat taking a flight on a helicopter that was cool. You can look around and see the pilot and all round you by moving your head as you normaly would do.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Llanes

customer_reviews.title: This is truly a good product. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.text: My son had expressed to my daughter that he had wanted this so he was so surprised when he open the box and saw I had gotten, cause she told him she wasn't doing it. He's been having such a blast with it. He had us all try it out and I too was scared . The graphics were so real, it was as it I was right there in it. This is truly a good product. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good first buy for those interested in VR
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. Pros: 1. Doesnt need external power 2. Light weight 3. Easy to adjust 4. Easy to store 5. The front cover helps protect the lens from dust Cons 1. Relies on the phone speaker 2. It takes time to get used to the touch buttons 3. The resolution is still pixelated (Depends on phone resolution) OVerally, i am happy with this product. It seems to work well and its easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: ASwin sankaran

customer_reviews.title: Such Excitement
customer_reviews.text: Oh the joys of living in a fantasy world. It was nice to see places that I'm not sure I'll ever travel to, swimming with marine life (especially the sharks), and maybe the biggest thrill of all was being within inches of tigers. Way to go VR.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! Just received the product today and both my son and I cannot put it down! We both wear glasses and are both able to enjoy it with no problems. We have had no overheating issues with my Galaxy 7 and have not experienced any significant battery drain. Is it perfect? No. Are the images flawless? No. But, it is immersive and a unique platform on which to watch Netflix as well as playing games.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great VR Experience!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a VR headset prior to this and because of how bad the quality it was I decided to just get this one for my S7. It does not disappoint. It is some of the best experiences I have and all my friends/family love it! I would recommend this headset if you have a compatible samsung phone and the money to spend
customer_reviews.author: CER PC Services

customer_reviews.title: Much better optics than the standard Google Cardboard
customer_reviews.text: Much better optics than the standard Google Cardboard. It's a good medium between the high-end devices that will be coming out (Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, Playstation VR) and the low-end devices made of cardboard. VR is the future so if you want to make a small investment in checking it out this is a good option if you have a recent Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Farver

customer_reviews.title: Definite BUY  for ur galaxy mobile.  Wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: My FIRST review for any product i bought in Amazon. Absolute add on to your galaxy device. I wasn't happy with my phone till now. But now i dont regret my buy because it supports gear VR. Amazing experience i have ever had. Watching netflix from the netflix exclusive app and youtube from the browser is great. Photos videos games all in all next level experience.
customer_reviews.author: Vadivel

customer_reviews.title: you can't beat a deal like this. It's a great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: In the world of VR, you can't beat a deal like this. It's a great product for the price. The most surprising part of the headset is how good the head tracking is. Using the VR is literally as simple as putting your phone into the device. The only thing that that is stopping this from being a 5 star review is how much the phone can heat up somewhat quickly, and the occasional foggy googles. Fog can be fixed easily with some anti-fog spray anyway. Overall you get much more than what you're paying for, purchasing this to go along with your current model Galaxy or Note is a no-brainer nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Simon K.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me. I have a macular hole in one eye, so part of what should be my field of view is black. Ididn't think about the fact this headset has objects that surround you, some of which I couldn't see without constantly twisting my head. I don't believe you can wear glasses with these, so people who must wear glasses may not get the full benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Superior to Google Glass, inferior to nearly everything else. Fun. Reasonably affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars. It's a 3 star product with a 5 star price (affordable). I honestly find the pixels to be so visible as to be distracting. It's not the product's fault. It's a facet of the pixels in a phone, there's not much you can do about this. It did exactly what I thought it did. It lit up my excitement for VR, and I now know I want the full blown thing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: Lovr this gear vr. Works perfectly with my s6 edge. Automatically downloaded the ocolus app when I put it in the vr. Our favorite thing to watch is I'm 360. You can download different ones to see from it. Africa, Iceland ,Rome, and many more. They are our favorites. Haven't had any issues yet. Amazing and great fun for thr whole family. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Prine

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Gear VR
customer_reviews.text: Very cool headset to have for the geeks out there. It uses your phone. In my case a note 5. Still kind of blurry because you are looking through lenses into your phones display but for the most part the experience and options with apps and movies make this a way better set than cardboard. Touch controls on side. Cannot wait till VR progresses into a holodeck. Until then this is the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Just... wow!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first VR. I can honestly say it is really good. I use it with a galaxy s6. It fiits perfectly and very realistic, I just can't believe it. And for the fraction of the price of a new model.. Would very very highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Falsh101

customer_reviews.title: Great....but too HOT!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Samsung VR, however, every time I try to use the device, within 5 minutes my s6 edge phone overheats. The Samsung VR then tells me to remove my mobile device and let cool to continue. I have read some reviews, and a few other users have run into the same problem. Unfortunately, I have not found a fix for the overheating issue. Again, the Samsung VR device is absolutely amazing, and should recieve 5 stars, however, with the limited time in use due to the phone overheating issue...4
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Yort

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but.............
customer_reviews.text: I'll be quick and to the point. Pros: Cool tech! Very immersing experience! Did not overheat my Note 5. Cons: Image quality. Lack of apps. Drains battery very fast. Have to take phone out of case. I can't wait for future releases of VR hardware and software. I will probably be returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. I know everyone had a great time with it on Christmas day. I hope they are still enjoying it now.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good intro to VR
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun introduction to VR, but don't expect miracles the 2k displays on supported phones aren't high resolution enough to provide a perfect visual experience. It's is however a vast improvement over google cardboard and fun to play with as an intro to VR Get the Cardboard for Gear VR app to add capability to use all google cardboard apps with this. (More VR content to play with is always better)
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D WENTWORTH

customer_reviews.title: Works with the GS7
customer_reviews.text: It works well with my Galaxy S7. A great way to mess around with VR for about the cost of a fast food combo meal.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Howell

customer_reviews.title: this is pretty fun. We just got it yesterday and everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: For a first attempt a commercial VR, this is pretty fun. We just got it yesterday and everyone loves playing with it. As long as you don't expect the moon and stars with this you will enjoy the product. My 2 year old is absolutely going nuts playing with it. See for yourself how my son reacts to swimming with the dolphins.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton D. Hart

customer_reviews.title: I love the Netflix app and the theater app
customer_reviews.text: Although it says that this product is out of stock, I received it in less than 2 weeks. Anyways, this is a real treat. I love the Netflix app and the theater app. The big screen you're getting is awesome. This is definitely something worth getting for $100. Of course, there is a long way to go with VR, but this is something to get excited about. If you need to get something for your significant other or your kid who loves tech? Look no further. You can make someone's Christmas with this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Ever wanted to look like Cyclops from the X-Men?
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Fit my Galaxy S6 no problem. Still learning all the things I can do. For those worried about battery life of their phone note that the problem is not with the GearVR it is with the Oculus Software. Oculus is fixing the issue. Give them time. VR is still relatively new.
customer_reviews.author: AD2

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to play around with but it is not quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the VR is not quite there yet. It is fun to play around with but it is not quite convincing yet. This headset though will allow you to view it all just as good as it can be seen
customer_reviews.author: Caledonia Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Great VR
customer_reviews.text: Great VR for a great price. I haven't had any problems out of it. The only bad thing is all the VR apps save to internal memory on my S7 edge, so my memory is getting low. My phone has only over heated one time so far
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Cline

customer_reviews.title: Overheats easily
customer_reviews.text: FIts the phone (S7) well, but I wish that the phone could charge while in the device- it drains battery incredibly quickly. My phone also overheats within 15 minutes unless I point a fan at it as I'm using the device.
customer_reviews.author: Duredel

customer_reviews.title: Destroys phone.
customer_reviews.text: This product destroys your S6 phone. Beware. Causes overheating. Software corrupts your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very little sweet spot with this one
customer_reviews.text: Buy this only when on sale. I returned the first one cause the first one was blurry, but the replacement was no improvement. Very little sweet spot with this one. Can't say the same for the black ones,(2017 model).
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Look into the future or, in the case of the Gear VR, the screen of your phone
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price if you have a compatible phone currently, however, the S6 I used this with over heated quite quickly (maybe 30 minutes into a Netflix movie). However, that said, it is still a great way to experience early stage VR. Not the best and not what it will be in less than year even, but cheap in comparison to full-fledged VR headsets coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great, but gets old.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product and works as advertised. I bought this as a toy and didn't plan on using it everyday. One issue, even if I wanted to use it everyday it just isn't practical. This is definitely just a toy that one uses for maybe a week or more and stops because it gets old quick.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: great product, however
customer_reviews.text: great product, however, I can't seem to get them to focus. I don' t know if it is the Headset or my head. I love them nonetheless and will be trying the new ones as the reviews said they are a lot better than these and the focus is better!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Pollard

customer_reviews.title: I see what you did there, Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level VR. Pros: It's pretty comfortable to wear. Inexpensive if you already happen to own a supported phone. Software integration is fairly well implemented. Near VR, which is what this should've been called. Still, it's really FUN. Cons: Only supports a few specific models Lacking content on the app store, in particular, it would be nice to have a few demos!
customer_reviews.author: In Philly

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple cheaper Cardboard Viewers but, if your interested in VR this is the one to get, especially if you have a newer Samsung phone. The adjustable focus and comfortable fit is worth it alone but, the added Samsung and Ocullus store content exceed what's available for the basic Cardboard viewer. If you've never bought a VR headset, I'd still recommend a cheap <$20 viewer. If you want to upgrade to a more durable and finished product, this is it. I don't often write reviews so yeah, it's that cool.
customer_reviews.author: R D Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy overall!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is phenomenal! Take advantage of owning a Samsung phone and treat yourself. Some of the apps put you right there. I took off one star because it does overheat quickly and I worried about the damage to my phone. I just took breaks every 20 minutes or so which would be annoying if you were watching a full movie.
customer_reviews.author: gypsy_cookie

customer_reviews.title: Phone gets too hot unit shuts down...
customer_reviews.text: Phone over heated within 10 minutes no matter how I messed with the pertinent settings. Checked forums checked everything, unit was basically unusable. Would've been great if it worked. Just about all my friends have to make their own heat sync in order to use it continuously. I had it packaged and returned within 24 hours of receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: thegov

customer_reviews.title: My bad, ordered the wrong one...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, did NOT fit Samsung 5, as it says in the documentation.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to get focused.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot focus my vision in. Would be better if each eye had a focus wheel as my left eye is weaker than my right. It is still pretty cool to use. But my phone heats up pretty fast so it shuts down after 15 minutes. I would not have purchase this knowing the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in every way
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a galaxy s7 so I figuered why not give it a try and I was shocked by how good it is. Not only does it make you feel like you're in the game you can watch Netflix in your new house. Surprisingly it doesn't make me as dizzy as I was expecting, and it fits comfortably over my glasses. Definitely would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The coolest gadget you can buy for $100!
customer_reviews.text: The coolest gadget that one can buy for $100. All my geek buddies love it and can't wait for the new virtual reality gear coming out to support bigger and better applications. It's clear to me that this is really a proof of concept, but it's very convincing and just cool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Edskilove

customer_reviews.title: OK for Infant Tech
customer_reviews.text: If you lower your expectations about VR quality and the availability of good games/applications or the NO AVAILABILITY of a compatible hand-held controller, this can be pretty addictive.
customer_reviews.author: TQM Doctor

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH GALAXY S8
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and as it turns out, it's not compatible with the Galaxy S8. I am sure it works fine, just not with the newest Galaxy.
customer_reviews.author: DivisionBell81

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Before this purchase I had purchased a cheap pair of VR googls and let me say this product is so worth the cost. I am new to the VR scene but OMG I am loving it. Great entertainment for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Fergie64

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality, super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little device, and crazy cheep! I was surprised how good the quality of this device is, especially for the price. Plus it comes with a good headstrap, and its adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he really loves it. I think the only downside and the reason I only gave it 4 stars is that it makes his phone really hot so he doesn't use it for too long at any time. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: but this was shockingly good. These has become a big hit when guests ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the first Oculus goggles so VR already blew my mind, but this was shockingly good. These has become a big hit when guests are over. The only reason i gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is because after about 10-20min of use, the phone will stop due to overheating. This is the old generation so i wouldnt be surprised if this was addressed in the new version.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A must by for Samsung Customers
customer_reviews.text: Love it Love it Love it Love it Love it . This is a great deal for anyone with a Samsung S6 or higher. Clearly the wave of the future. Once you get one you will never see movies or games in the same way. Only drawback is watching long movies, sometimes you need to take a break halfway through.
customer_reviews.author: J. Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Note 5 and my Gear VR controller
customer_reviews.author: Sharp911

customer_reviews.title: Much fun
customer_reviews.text: Received very fast, packaged well. Love this headset. Whole family is having a blast with it. Well made. Only thing I think needs improved is the pad on the right side of the headset needs a bump or something so you can feel it when you have to tap it
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Silva

product_meta.title: Samsung Gear VR (2015) - Note 5, GS6s (US Version w/ Warranty - Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Mobile virtual reality is finally here. With the Samsung Gear VR, you can play amazing games, watch Hollywood's best movies in your own private cinema (or even on the moon!), socialize with friends new and old, be at the center of a suspense thriller, and so much more. The Gear VR drops you right into the action-and it's only from Samsung & Oculus.
feature_bullets: Light weight so you can play and watch more comfortably
Wide field of view, precise head-tracking and low latency brings reality to the virtual. Be transported to amazing new worlds in games, video, and images. Thousands of 360 degree panoramic photos
Compatible with: Samsung Galaxy Note5,S6 edge+,S6,S6 edge
Improved fit, including room for most eyeglasses and improved padding for extra comfort and durability
Light weight so you can play and watch more comfortably
Wide field of view, precise head-tracking and low latency brings reality to the virtual. Be transported to amazing new worlds in games, video, and images. Thousands of 360 degree panoramic photos
Compatible with: Samsung Galaxy Note5, S6 edge+, S6, S6 edge
Improved fit, including room for most eyeglasses and improved padding for extra comfort and durability
